page.title: 13The Chapel, Horningsham
page.content: Approximately five hundred visitors a year go to see the {Chapel}in Horningsham. So far this year people from Sount Africa, Australia, Belgium, New Zealand, Canada, Poland, France, Holland and America have signed the visitors book. So far this year(July) two weddings, two funerals and two Christening have taken place in addition to the one service a week. There are special services at Christmas, Easter and Harvest times. The Congragation numbers about twenty and at certain times they join with the Village Church for Harvest, Patronal and Christian Unity Services. Various preachers visit the Chapel from a thirty-mile radius. The Chapel is always decorated with flowers supplied by members.
